preference.name: CATIA_create_dataset_on_foreignfile_ir
preference.preference_description: Allow the Create CATPart dataset and the Create CATProduct dataset commands on a BOM line of foreign files. (True) Prevent creation of CATPart and CATProduct datasets on a BOM line of foreign files (False)
